item.title: Finding and 3D Printing a Hand
item.description: Finding and 3D Printing a Hand TLDR; This is a long post as it’s the back story to the whole project and how it came about to getting a design for the hand, it covers the 3D design and printing as well as the problems along the way. Don’t worry if your here hoping to see code and electronics or even the Xamarin App thats coming soon, I just need to explain where the Handy design came from first.
